programmes.show_description: Audacious action with Orlando Bloom. When a washed up private security agent's mission in Shangai goes awry, he must outsmart a gang of dangerous criminals to survive (2017).
After a kidnapping, Mannering is forced to sell a fake painting.
Steed and Peel investigate when the ghost of a Duke is spotted in the local area. But will their initial investigation ultimately lead them to a ruthless plot?
Join officers from New Zealand Police as they patrol the streets and race to the scene of real-life emergency calls.
Explosive western with Trace Adkins and Ron Perlman. For ranch enforcer South, justice is a loaded gun. But he's about to discover a dark secret behind his life of violence and bloodshed... (2014)

Western starring Burt Lancaster. A rich man hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a Mexican outlaw. Also starring Lee Marvin and Jack Palance. (1966)
Classic western starring John Wayne. A tough cowboy and rich oil baron fight for power, land and love in 1900s Oklahoma. Who will triumph in this explosive battle of wills (1943)?

Hollister assumes the identity of the jailed Burt Taggert to try to stop Juan Diego attacking Tombstone, since Taggert has links with Diego to supply dynamite and they have never met.
After Clay gives lawyer and saloon owner, J. Homer Radcliffe, a bill for his taxes, he challenges Clay to collect back taxes from a group of outlaws .

Gambit and Purdey go undercover after Steed's chance encounter with an old friend. Are high profile people being replaced by lookalikes ?
Can Steed and Peel prove their innocence when they are implicated in the deaths of foreign agents? Stars Patrick Macnee and Diana Rigg.
The Baron is tricked into looking over a deal between the King of Ammak and a millionaire to buy some of the Ammak crown jewels.
